name: Contrario
long_description: Contrario is the first autonomous recruiting agency powered entirely by Al. We help companies built early-stage teams faster by sourcing and screening high-quality candidates for you. Our platform leverages proprietary AI matching algorithms to identify job seekers and uses an elite network of pre-vetted expert recruiters to fill your hardest roles. We also leverage voice AI to perform behavioral screenings before passing candidates forward. We help Seed to Series C+ companies find the best talent to build their teams.
one_liner: The 1st fully autonomous AI recruiting agency
